meanings.definition: Having all necessary or normal parts or components
meanings.sent1: The compleat puzzle had all its pieces in place.
meanings.sent2: The compleat car came with all its essential parts.
meanings.sent3: The compleat recipe called for every ingredient in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: Her compleat outfit was like a perfectly assembled jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The compleat set of tools made the job much easier.

meanings.definition: Skilled, proficient, or accomplished in all aspects
meanings.sent1: He was a compleat musician, excelling in every instrument.
meanings.sent2: The compleat chef could cook any dish to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The compleat athlete could juggle, run, and swim with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her compleat knowledge of the subject impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The compleat artist painted with skill beyond compare.
